replies.body:
That was a glorious moment!

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-N2ZQ4Z46_9o/VJTri4jgC7I/AAAAAAAADzU/fX88vOZU7PA/w1200-h630-p-nu/Heresy%2BTRain.png

I think this is how it felt when they saw us pass.
https://media.giphy.com/media/uYeItFv70QD2E/giphy.gif

Sion is the best.
Emphasis on "pass"
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/46yluuSguLU/maxresdefault.jpg

I knew you were going to be posting something about this at some point.

It was a glorious charge.
I figured there wouldn't be anything better to post than the actual charge.

It was made even better in the replay by watching the minimap.  About ten seconds before we charged, one of the Vel'koz's put a "enemy missing" ping on midlane because they'd only seen me, who'd been scouting out their position prior to the charge, then the moment we were spotted they issued a "danger" ping, as if anyone needed that information when there were five Sions charging screaming down mid lane.
I imagine the guy who issues just being like, "There might be an issue here"
http://assets.diylol.com/hfs/d65/bf0/180/resized/thomas-the-rape-train-meme-generator-there-are-no-brakes-on-the-rape-train-f96515.jpg
CHOOO CHOOO
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/419/226/8ca.jpg
I don't want to get off of mr. sions wild ride
GOING OFF THE RAILS ON A CRAZY TRAIN
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b4gxKFAhfZc
WP guys, but next time you need Baron to bring minions with you (and {{item:3512}} {{item:3060}} and Super Minions)

We actually had Zz'rots (four of them, in fact), we were just saving them until we got to the enemy Nexus to drop them.

The gif was from a game-winning Nexus rush against the exposed Nexus of a Vel'Koz team.

Autobots, transform and ROLL OUT!

http://67.media.tumblr.com/d7ced02008d1aa5b1d80465f6c0d62b6/tumblr_mn03x67Ef01qcrr5qo1_400.gif

I managed to buy a copy of that movie for my older brother last year for christmas, but I could only find one that was in Korean lol.

The show is still in english, but it still spooked me when the box arrived with a different language on it
Not as bad as the time I ordered a bunch of volumes for a manga series online from Amazon only to get them and find out they're all in French.

O.O

That's hilarious, but also heartbreaking

I consider it my own stupidity more than anything but I still don't understand it because there's only been 1 volume of the manga translated into English yet all but 1 of the volumes have been translated into French and I don't mean to come off as entitled but I was under the impression America was a more valuable market for manga in the west so you'd think English would have been the first western language it got translated into.
Yeah, I understand. I have to be careful because I'm working my way through the Spice&Wolf light novels and I don't know how far they've been translated
No pain, no train.
